ygData.subject: Re: Archmage Answers
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Anyone else feel a bit disappointed by this? I felt he dodged or ignored most of the important issues, and didn t even seem to understand some of the
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, Feb 04/00, Benjamin Jerrad Segal <birdman@...> wrote:
> From: Benjamin Jerrad Segal <birdman@...>
>
> Enter Geoffrey.
>
> http://everquest.station.sony.com/everquest_h_archmage.html

Anyone else feel a bit disappointed by this? I felt he dodged or ignored
most of the important issues, and didn't even seem to understand some of
the questions, specifically the request for more defensive skills. He
started talking about bard's offence, which was basically irrelevant to
a request for more defensive skills.

--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
